name: Angular Social SignIn and Share
tagline: AngularJS implementation of Social SignIn and Social Share.
body:
### Angular Social SignIn and Share
AngularJS implementation of Social SignIn (Google Plus, Facebook, LinkedIn) and Social Share (Google Plus, Facebook, Twitter).This will also persist the data on Local Storage so on page refresh data will available.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
